title: Catastrophe modeling and PML reports
personalDataVerified: Actuary/modeler name, insurance company, PML (Probable Maximum Loss) estimates, catastrophe scenarios
personalDataVisible: Link to catastrophe modeling firm system (insurers and rating agencies, requires authentication)
rationale: Domain binding verifies catastrophe modeling firm (RMS, AIR Worldwide, CoreLogic) or credentialed actuary. Multi-billion dollar capital requirements for insurers. Regulatory compliance (AM Best, S&P ratings). Prevents underestimation of catastrophe risk exposing insurer to insolvency. Critical for property insurers in catastrophe-prone areas.
